name: Senior Business Intelligence Engineer
description:
Main Responsibilities:

  • Full cycle of development and support enterprise SQL DWH;
  • Design and implementing ETL processes;
  • Generate reports and dashboards

Crucial technical skills and knowledge:

  • SQL, DAX
  • MS SQL Server DBMS, SSIS, SSAS (Tabular is preferable);
  • Power BI or experience in other reporting software;
  • Data warehouse and business intelligence techniques (Kimball), star/snowflake schemas.

Desired skills and knowledge:

  • Dimensional modelling.
  • Understanding of data analytics/ data cleaning/ data quality processes;
  • OLAP/OLTP;
  • Knowledge of most popular data sources/data connectors;
  • C# or other programming languages – a plus;
  • Git/TFS or other VCS;
  • MS Office.

Once with us, we`ll offer you:

  • Official employment in an international company;
  • Wide opportunities for professional and career growth;
  • Enthusiastic and advanced team;
  • Competitive official salary;
  • Medical insurance (dental services are included);
  • English language courses;
  • Excellent coffee, tea, snacks in the office or everything you need to work remotely.

professional_roles.name: Менеджер по продажам, менеджер по работе с клиентами
